segments.text: I'm watching this kitchen and feeling a sense of unease.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is just running, endlessly, filling the sink to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then it cascades over the front, making a widening puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's peaceful dishwashing seems completely out of place here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should be panicking, not polishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm getting really anxious just watching that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to take a nasty fall, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's eager posture just makes the whole thing even more tense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a perfect storm of unnoticed dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene, but there's no one else here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is quite distressing to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The beautiful light from the window only makes the scene more poignant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a real mess very quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR
